devdoc.details: Contains all read/view functions from v1, separate from write operations

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

returns.lltvBps: Array of liquidation threshold values in basis points
returns.ltvBps: Array of LTV values in basis points

getLtv(address,address).details: Uses collateralFactor which determines how much can be borrowed

getMaxLtv(address,address).details: Uses liquidationThreshold which is higher than LTV - the point at which liquidation occurs

getReserveConfigs().details: Returns price, LTV (collateral factor), liquidation threshold for each market

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: VenusGatewayView

getCollateralFactors().notice: Get collateral factors for all markets (similar to Compound's getCollateralFactors)

getLtv(address,address).notice: Returns the LTV (borrowing power) for a user in basis points

getMaxLtv(address,address).notice: Returns the LLTV (liquidation threshold) for a user in basis points

getReserveConfigs().notice: Get reserve configuration data for all Venus markets (for frontend LTV calculations)
